|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [colorname()](./dw-random.colorrandom.colorname.md) |  | return a [Color Keyword](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value) |
|  [decimalcolor(options)](./dw-random.colorrandom.decimalcolor.md) |  | return a decimal color |

|  [hsl(options)](./dw-random.colorrandom.hsl.md) |  | return a hsl color |
|  [hsla(options)](./dw-random.colorrandom.hsla.md) |  | return a hsl color with alpha |
|  [rgb(options)](./dw-random.colorrandom.rgb.md) |  | return a rag color |
